segments.text: That's OK , Ben , just let it go . I thought you were just a little too much into it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I wasn't kidding before , OK , I'm fine now .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Honey , have you ever heard that there are a lot of stray cats now .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Now they are collected by some volunteers , and people can adopt them or make a donation for the shelters .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What are you saying ? You are acting weird today .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I want to adopt a cat , and it can be Barbie's boyfriend too .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Haha , very funny , but it doesn't make any sense to me .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's all right . At least I got myself left .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Seriously , if we will adopt any animals , we'd gotta to talk to Daniel .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I hope that he would grant me with that .
segments.speaker: S1
